mapper.select: SELECT h_uid "uid",h_title title, h_career career,to_date(h_regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-round(sysdate) remainDate FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM Hire ORDER BY h_uid DESC) T) WHERE RNUM >= #{from} AND RNUM < (#{from} + #{pageRows})
SELECT h_uid "uid",h_title title, h_career career,to_date(h_regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')-round(sysdate) remainDate FROM HIRE ORDER BY h_uid DESC
SELECT h_uid "uid", h_name name, h_part part FROM Hire WHERE h_uid= #{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Hire (C_UID,h_uid,h_name,h_title, h_salary,h_position1, h_position2, h_part,h_career,h_degree,h_workform,h_upDate,h_regDate) VALUES (#{C_UID},hire_seq.nextval,#{name},#{title},#{salary},#{position1} ,#{position2}, #{part},#{career},#{degree},#{workform},#{upDate},#{regDate})
